question_text: Website pe image dikhane ke liye konsa html tag use hota hai ?
img tag mai ‘src’ attribute kyu use hota hai ?

options.value: Website ka link dene ke liye
Image ka link dene ke liye
Image ko sundar bnane ke liye

question_text: ‘alt’ attribute mai likha text website par kab dikhta hai ?

options.value: Image ke achhe se dikhne par
Image ke achhe se load na hone par

question_text: Bina closing tag ke close hone wale html tag ko kya kahte hai ?
Inn sab mai se void element konsa hai ?

problem_statement: Aapko ek website bnani hai, jisme ek waterfall ki image dikhe aur agar kisi wagah se image load na ho pae to uski jagah "waterfall" text likha hua aa jae. Aap internet se koi bhi waterfall ki image use kar sakte hai.
